samples.name: Overview
samples.description: File Manager for JavaScript (ES5) with a details view and preview, designed to resemble a OneDrive user interface with customized icons in the File Manager's details view.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with full view of the File Manager like a windows explorer User Interface.

samples.name: Flat Data
samples.description: Introduces a new feature in the File Manager, Showcases the seamless integration of Flat Data retrieved as complete folder data as a array of JavaScript objects during the initial rendering of the File Manager.

samples.name: Custom Thumbnails
samples.description: This example of FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with how to use the custom thumbnails for the files and folders.

samples.name: API
samples.description: FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) render the File Manager without the navigation pane and enable or disable toolbar dynamically.

samples.name: Drag and Drop
samples.description: This example of FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with drag and drop feature to drag and drop the file.

samples.name: Directory upload
samples.description: This example demonstrates the how to upload the folder (directory) in a JavaScript(ES5) File Manager.

samples.name: Virtualization
samples.description: This example demonstrates on how to enable the virtual scrolling feature in a JavaScript(ES5) File Manager.

samples.name: File Upload
samples.description: FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with how to render the File Manager component inside the Dialog component.

samples.name: Access Control
samples.description: This example of FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with how to restrict the file operations in the File Manager component.

samples.name: Azure Blob Provider
samples.description: This example of FileManager for JavaScript(ES5) with how to configure and use the azure cloud service.

samples.name: NodeJS File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the nodejs server database service in a JavaScript(ES5)  File Manager.

samples.name: Amazon S3 File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the Amazon S3 service in a JavaScript(ES5)  File Manager.

samples.name: Firebase Realtime File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the firebase realtime database service in a JavaScript(ES5)  File Manager.

samples.name: IBM Cloud File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the IBM Cloud Object Storage file provider service in a JavaScript(ES5) File Manager.
